headline: Stifel Maintains Bullish Outlook on Realty Income (O) Amid Solid AFFO and Growth Prospects
summary: Realty Income Corporation (NYSE:O) is one of Goldman Sachs’ top REIT stock picks. On July 15, Stifel reaffirmed its Buy rating on Realty Income (NYSE:O), keeping the price target steady at $68. Stifel maintained its 2027 AFFO estimate at $4.52 for Realty Income. The company previously guided 2025 AFFO between $4.22 and $4.28, reflecting modest […]

headline: Proterra Investment Partners Announces Formal Launch of Net Lease Real Estate Strategy
summary: Proterra Investment Partners LP ("Proterra"), a Minneapolis-based alternative asset manager focused on private equity and private credit investments across the global food value chain, is pleased to announce the official launch of its Net Lease Real Estate strategy. This initiative further diversifies Proterra's portfolio and represents a strategic expansion into long-duration, yield-oriented real estate—leveraging the firm's deep expertise in the food value chain and agribusiness sectors.
